title: STAR WARS Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy + Official Patch v1.01
description:
This is CLEAN version of Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy aka JK3: Jedi Academy, part of Jedi Knight series.


Torrent content:

Jedi Academy CD1
Jedi Academy CD2
Official Patch v1.01
Game is in NRG (Nero Image File) MOUNTABLE with D-TOOLS.


Instructions:

1. Load CD1 "jediacad_1" start setup.
2. Through setup, you will be asked to load CD2, "jediacad_2".
3. You will be asked to load CD1 again to finish setup.
4. Install patch, restart your PC.
5. Mount CD1 of Jedi Academy.
5. PLAY game.


No need for cracks or serials.
No STEAM.
Pure and clean game, working on Windows XP and on Windows 7 (x86 and x64).


Enjoy and seed!
